column4: hi, got a question. What linux folder is like the Window's My Documents folder. i got somethings I want to download but I don't know the linux file system that well
use whatever strucutre you like in your HOME.  I use ~/docs, but you could do ~/Documents too or something similar if you prefer.  ~ means /home/username
no, by default anyone can read it
you can right click on it and go to properties, permissions
